alert.note: Alert for Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 11:24PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pottawattamie County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Crescent, or 12 miles north of Omaha, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Underwood. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa near mile marker 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Iowa.
